ur_rna.StructureEditor.models

Class Strand

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<Nuc>
        • ur_rna.StructureEditor.models.Strand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Nuc>, java.util.Collection<Nuc>, java.util.List<Nuc>, INucGroup

    public class Strand
extends java.util.AbstractList<Nuc>
implements INucGroup
    A Strand represents a single RNA strand. An RNA drawing could potentially contain multiple strands, and the strands can each contain inter-molecular connections (e.g. base pairs) to other strands.

      • getEnd

        int getEnd()
        Get the scene index of the last nucleotide in this strand plus one. I.e. the index just beyond this strand: offset+size

      • getNextInScene

        public Nuc getNextInScene(Nuc nuc,
                          int steps,
                          boolean loopToBeginning)
        Returns the next nucleotide after the specified one, regardless of whether it is in this strand or another one. If the resulting index is greater than the number of nucleotides, null will be returned, unless loopToBeginning is true, in which case the scene is considered to be a circuit and numbering continues at the beginning (i.e. the next Nuc after the last Nuc is the first Nuc etc).

      • getPrev

        public Nuc getPrev(Nuc nuc)

      • getSceneStart
